ScamDunk
https://scamdunk.com

Purpose: ScamDunk helps retail investors identify potential scam-like red flags in stock pitches.

Preferred content:
- Marketing, product, and FAQ content from the main site.
- Legal and policy pages: /privacy, /terms, /disclaimer.

Avoid indexing:
- Authentication pages and user-specific dashboards.
- Admin-only or internal preview pages.

Contact: info@scamdunk.com
